# StringExtensions.IsNumeric method

Determines whether the specified value is a numeric value.

```csharp
public static bool IsNumeric(this string value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The value. |

## Return Value

true if is numeric; Otherwise false.
